name: shsel1i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2))), wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, csh))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(c1[+H]c2)), c1 ∈ SH, c2 ∈ SH)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)))
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, csh)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)))
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, csh)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c1, csh), wcel(c2, csh)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, cph, c2)))
-| wcel(c1, csh)
-| wcel(c2, csh)

comment: A subspace sum contains a member of one of its subspaces. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
